mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.annotations AS "annotations", a.attacment AS "attacment", a.attitudes_count AS "attitudesCount", a.comments_count AS "commentsCount", a.created_date AS "createdDate", a.middle_pic AS "middlePic", a.original_pic AS "originalPic", a.reposts_count AS "repostsCount", a.source AS "source", a.content AS "content", a.thumbnail_pic AS "thumbnailPic", a.type AS "type", a.category_id AS "category.id", b.name AS "category.name", a.profile_id AS "profileId", a.is_head AS "isHead", a.summary AS "summary", a.tags AS "tags", a.top AS "top", a.title AS "title"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jhi_statuses( attacment, created_date, middle_pic, original_pic, source, content, category_id, is_head, summary, tags, top, title, profile_id ) VALUES ( #{attacment}, #{createDate}, #{middlePic}, #{originalPic}, #{source}, #{content}, #{category.id}, #{isHead}, #{summary}, #{tags}, #{top}, #{title}, #{profileId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jhi_statuses SET attacment = #{attacment}, middle_pic = #{middlePic}, original_pic = #{originalPic}, source = #{source}, content = #{content}, category_id = #{category.id}, is_head = #{isHead}, summary = #{summary}, tags = #{tags}, top = #{top}, title = #{title} WHERE id = #{id}
